mapper.update:
update driving_school
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
service_city_id = #{record.serviceCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_name = #{record.schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{record.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{record.latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
longitude = #{record.longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP = #{record.lastUpdatedTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_STAMP = #{record.lastUpdatedStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

LONGTITUDE = #{record.longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_TX_STAMP = #{record.createdTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_hide = #{record.isHide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
can_select = #{record.canSelect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
school_detail = #{record.schoolDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_imgurl = #{record.schoolImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_avator = #{record.schoolAvator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_hd = #{record.schoolHd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update driving_school set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_city_id = #{record.serviceCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_name = #{record.schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{record.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{record.latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, longitude = #{record.longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP = #{record.lastUpdatedTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_STAMP = #{record.lastUpdatedStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_STAMP = #{record.createdStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LONGTITUDE = #{record.longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_TX_STAMP = #{record.createdTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_hide = #{record.isHide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, can_select = #{record.canSelect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, school_detail = #{record.schoolDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_imgurl = #{record.schoolImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_avator = #{record.schoolAvator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_hd = #{record.schoolHd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_index = #{record.schoolIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_address = #{record.shortAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_number = #{record.registerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bus_line = #{record.busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, practice_arrangement = #{record.practiceArrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_number = #{record.carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_number = #{record.locationNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update driving_school
service_city_id = #{serviceCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP = #{lastUpdatedTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_STAMP = #{lastUpdatedStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_STAMP = #{createdStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LONGTITUDE = #{longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_TX_STAMP = #{createdTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_hide = #{isHide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
can_select = #{canSelect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
school_detail = #{schoolDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_imgurl = #{schoolImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_avator = #{schoolAvator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_hd = #{schoolHd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_index = #{schoolIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_address = #{shortAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_number = #{registerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bus_line = #{busLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
practice_arrangement = #{practiceArrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_number = #{locationNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select service_city.id as cityId, service_city.name as cityName, driving_school.id as schoolId, driving_school.school_name as schoolName, driving_school.address as schoolAddress, driving_school.latitude as schoolLatitude, driving_school.longitude as schoolLongtitude, driving_school.school_detail as schoolDetail, driving_school.school_avator as schoolAvator, driving_school.school_imgurl as schoolImgUrl, driving_school.school_hd as schoolHd, driving_school.school_index as schoolIndex, driving_school.can_select as canSelect, driving_school.price as price from driving_school inner join service_city on service_city.id = driving_school.service_city_id where service_city.id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND driving_school.is_hide!='Y' order by cityId
mapper.insert:
insert into driving_school
id,
service_city_id,
school_name,
address,
latitude,
longitude,

#{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: select service_city.id as cityId, service_city.name as cityName, driving_school.id as schoolId, driving_school.school_name as schoolName, driving_school.address as schoolAddress, driving_school.latitude as schoolLatitude, driving_school.longitude as schoolLongtitude, driving_school.school_detail as schoolDetail, driving_school.school_avator as schoolAvator, driving_school.school_imgurl as schoolImgUrl, driving_school.school_hd as schoolHd, driving_school.school_index as schoolIndex, driving_school.can_select as canSelect, driving_school.price as price from driving_school inner join service_city on service_city.id = driving_school.service_city_id where driving_school.id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND driving_school.is_hide!='Y'
